title: The summer of infrastructure with Benjy Sarlin & Tara Palmeri
description: Washington is emptying out ahead of the July fourth weekend … with the Senate in recess and the House leaving town for two weeks on Thursday afternoon. Before they go, Congressional Democrats will vote to create a select committee on January 6th. Still on the table — how will Washington move forward on infrastructure.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Washington is emptying out ahead of the July fourth weekend … with the Senate in recess and the House leaving town for two weeks on Thursday afternoon. Before they go, Congressional Democrats will vote to create a select committee on January 6th. Still on the table — how will Washington move forward on infrastructure.
itunes:title: The summer of infrastructure with Benjy Sarlin & Tara Palmeri
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Tara Palmeri, co-author of the Politico Playbook, and Benjy Sarlin, policy editor in the NBC News Political Unit, join Chuck to talk about the week in politics.
